text: An order for the substitution of publication for personal service may not be made until:
historical:

1981 Ed., ยง 13-338.

1973 Ed., ยง 13-338.

sections.text: a summons for the defendant has been issued and returned "Not to be found," and
the nonresidence of the defendant or his absence for at least six months is proved by affidavit to the satisfaction of the court.
